events.message: I received my order last week but I want to return the item as it does not fit. Please advise on how to get a refund.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on customer's mention of returning an item and refund.
An agent from the refund department has been assigned to handle this customer case.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your return and refund process. Can you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please share the reason for return and confirm the item’s condition.
The order number is 12345678. The item is unused but the size is too small for me.
Thank you for the info. You can send back the item using our prepaid return label, and we will process the refund once received.
That sounds good. I will arrange for the package to be sent back tomorrow.
We received your returned item and have processed the refund back to your original payment method.
Just checking in to make sure your refund was received and everything is now resolved on your end.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing this case. Feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
